vernac_cmds: Lemma varignon : forall A B C D I J K L, A<>C -> B<>D -> ~ Col I J K -> Midpoint I A B -> Midpoint J B C -> Midpoint K C D -> Midpoint L A D -> Parallelogram I J K L.
assert (Par I L B D) by perm_apply (triangle_mid_par B D A L I).
assert (Par J K B D) by perm_apply (triangle_mid_par B D C K J).
assert (Par I L J K) by (apply par_trans with B D;finish).
assert (Par I J A C) by perm_apply (triangle_mid_par A C B J I).
assert (Par L K A C) by perm_apply (triangle_mid_par A C D K L).
assert (Par I J K L) by (apply par_trans with A C;finish).
Lemma varignon_aux_aux : forall A B C D I J K L, A<>C -> J<>L -> Midpoint I A B -> Midpoint J B C -> Midpoint K C D -> Midpoint L A D -> Parallelogram I J K L.
Name X the midpoint of B and D.
assert (Par B D L I /\ Cong B X L I) by (apply (triangle_mid_par_cong_1 A B D X L I);finish).
assert (Par B D K J /\ Cong B X K J) by (apply (triangle_mid_par_cong_1 C B D X K J);finish).
assert (Par I L J K) by (eapply par_trans with B D;finish).
assert (Cong I L J K) by (eapply cong_transitivity with B X;finish).
Name X' the midpoint of A and C.
assert (Par A C J I /\ Cong A X' J I) by (apply (triangle_mid_par_cong_1 B A C X' J I);finish).
assert (Par A C K L /\ Cong A X' K L) by (apply (triangle_mid_par_cong_1 D A C X' K L);finish).
assert (Par I J K L) by (eapply par_trans with A C;finish).
assert (Cong I J K L) by (eapply cong_transitivity with A X';finish).
Lemma varignon_aux : forall A B C D I J K L, (A<>C \/ B<>D) -> J<>L -> Midpoint I A B -> Midpoint J B C -> Midpoint K C D -> Midpoint L A D -> Parallelogram I J K L.
Name X the midpoint of B and D.
assert (Par B D L I /\ Cong B X L I) by (apply (triangle_mid_par_cong_1 A B D X L I);finish).
assert (Par B D K J /\ Cong B X K J) by (apply (triangle_mid_par_cong_1 C B D X K J);finish).
assert (Par I L J K) by (eapply par_trans with B D;finish).
assert (Cong I L J K) by (eapply cong_transitivity with B X;finish).
Name X' the midpoint of A and C.
assert (Par A C J I /\ Cong A X' J I) by (apply (triangle_mid_par_cong_1 B A C X' J I);finish).
assert (Par A C K L /\ Cong A X' K L) by (apply (triangle_mid_par_cong_1 D A C X' K L);finish).
assert (Par I J K L) by (eapply par_trans with A C;finish).
assert (Cong I J K L) by (eapply cong_transitivity with A X';finish).
Lemma varignon' : forall A B C D I J K L, (A<>C \/ B<>D) -> Midpoint I A B -> Midpoint J B C -> Midpoint K C D -> Midpoint L A D -> Parallelogram I J K L.
Name X the midpoint of B and D.
assert (Par B L L K /\ Par B C K X /\ Par L C L X /\ Cong B X K L /\ Cong L X K L /\ Cong B L K X /\ Cong C L K X /\ Cong L K L X /\ Cong C K L X).
apply (triangle_mid_par_flat_cong B L C K L X);Col;Midpoint.
assert (Par A B L X /\ Par A D X I /\ Par B D L I /\ Cong A I X L /\ Cong B I X L /\ Cong A L X I /\ Cong D L X I /\ Cong B X L I /\ Cong D X L I).
apply (triangle_mid_par_cong A B D X L I);auto.
assert (Par B C X K /\ Par B D K L /\ Par C D X L /\ Cong B L K X /\ Cong C L K X /\ Cong B X K L /\ Cong D X K L /\ Cong C K X L /\ Cong D K X L).
apply (triangle_mid_par_cong B C D K X L);auto.
assert (Parallelogram A D B C) by (apply mid_plg with I;Midpoint).
assert (Parallelogram A B D C) by (apply mid_plg with L;Midpoint).

command: assert (Par I L B D) by perm_apply (triangle_mid_par B D A L I).
assert (Par J K B D) by perm_apply (triangle_mid_par B D C K J).
assert (Par I L J K) by (apply par_trans with B D;finish).
assert (Par I J A C) by perm_apply (triangle_mid_par A C B J I).
assert (Par L K A C) by perm_apply (triangle_mid_par A C D K L).
assert (Par I J K L) by (apply par_trans with A C;finish).
Name X the midpoint of B and D.
assert (Par B D L I /\ Cong B X L I) by (apply (triangle_mid_par_cong_1 A B D X L I);finish).
assert (Par B D K J /\ Cong B X K J) by (apply (triangle_mid_par_cong_1 C B D X K J);finish).
assert (Par I L J K) by (eapply par_trans with B D;finish).
assert (Cong I L J K) by (eapply cong_transitivity with B X;finish).
Name X' the midpoint of A and C.
assert (Par A C J I /\ Cong A X' J I) by (apply (triangle_mid_par_cong_1 B A C X' J I);finish).
assert (Par A C K L /\ Cong A X' K L) by (apply (triangle_mid_par_cong_1 D A C X' K L);finish).
assert (Par I J K L) by (eapply par_trans with A C;finish).
assert (Cong I J K L) by (eapply cong_transitivity with A X';finish).
Name X the midpoint of B and D.
assert (Par B D L I /\ Cong B X L I) by (apply (triangle_mid_par_cong_1 A B D X L I);finish).
assert (Par B D K J /\ Cong B X K J) by (apply (triangle_mid_par_cong_1 C B D X K J);finish).
assert (Par I L J K) by (eapply par_trans with B D;finish).
assert (Cong I L J K) by (eapply cong_transitivity with B X;finish).
Name X' the midpoint of A and C.
assert (Par A C J I /\ Cong A X' J I) by (apply (triangle_mid_par_cong_1 B A C X' J I);finish).
assert (Par A C K L /\ Cong A X' K L) by (apply (triangle_mid_par_cong_1 D A C X' K L);finish).
assert (Par I J K L) by (eapply par_trans with A C;finish).
assert (Cong I J K L) by (eapply cong_transitivity with A X';finish).
Name X the midpoint of B and D.
assert (Par B L L K /\ Par B C K X /\ Par L C L X /\ Cong B X K L /\ Cong L X K L /\ Cong B L K X /\ Cong C L K X /\ Cong L K L X /\ Cong C K L X).
apply (triangle_mid_par_flat_cong B L C K L X);Col;Midpoint.
assert (Par A B L X /\ Par A D X I /\ Par B D L I /\ Cong A I X L /\ Cong B I X L /\ Cong A L X I /\ Cong D L X I /\ Cong B X L I /\ Cong D X L I).
apply (triangle_mid_par_cong A B D X L I);auto.
assert (Par B C X K /\ Par B D K L /\ Par C D X L /\ Cong B L K X /\ Cong C L K X /\ Cong B X K L /\ Cong D X K L /\ Cong C K X L /\ Cong D K X L).
apply (triangle_mid_par_cong B C D K X L);auto.
assert (Parallelogram A D B C) by (apply mid_plg with I;Midpoint).
assert (Parallelogram A B D C) by (apply mid_plg with L;Midpoint).
